name: avatar
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: avatar
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: an image that represents you in online games, chat rooms, etc. and that you can move around the screen
trans_examp.trans_cn: （网络游戏或网络聊天中的）虚拟化身

example.eg: You can talk to other avatars with your words displayed in a cartoon bubble.
example.egtrans: 你可以和其他玩家的虚拟化身交谈，你所键入的话语会出现在你虚拟化身头上的一个卡通对话框中。

dsense.name: avatar
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: especially in Hinduism, a god who appears on earth as a person
trans_examp.trans_cn: （印度神话中）下凡化作人形的神，化身
